TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CryptoHmacFinalized extends Microsoft.Health.Authentication.CryptoHashFinalized

Docs.summary: Represents finalized Hash Message Authentication Code (HMAC) states that are sent via XML requests.
Docs.remarks: HealthVault verifies the hash against this object's digest.

Docs.param: A string representing the algorithm name.
An array of bytes representing the HMAC digest.
Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of the class with a known algorithm identifier and finalized Hash Message Authentication Code (HMAC) digest.
